DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH
DOC.TEXT: Russian Industrial Output Plummets : The record 25.5 % decline in January compared to a year earlier was reported by the State Statistics Committee in Moscow , according to the Interfax news_agency . Industrial output fell 18 % in 1993 and 16 % in 1992 . Russia ' s new government , dominated by conservative ministers with close links to industry , hopes to support production with growth-oriented policies , including cheap loans to agriculture and higher state subsidies .
